scripts.server: cross-env NODE_ENV=production OTEL_RESOURCE_ATTRIBUTES=service.name=frontend,deployment.environment=dev OTEL_EXPORTER_OTLP_TRACES_ENDPOINT=https://ingest.au0.signalfx.com/v2/trace/otlp OTEL_EXPORTER_OTLP_HEADERS='X-SF-TOKEN=ish5gWj9-CxjMvrLiCd9QQ,Content-Type=application/x-protobuf' OTEL_SERVICE_NAME=frontend OTEL_PROPAGATORS=tracecontext OTEL_LOG_LEVEL=DEBUG OTEL_TRACES_SAMPLER=always_on node --require @opentelemetry/auto-instrumentations-node/register --require ./instrumentation.js server.js
